summary:
Allows many more arrows (and ice shards) to stick in actors (enemies and player alike) as well as increases how long arrows stay visible on actors.

Several options to choose from: amounts and durations for your shooting pleasure.
descriptionHtml:
Arrow in the Everywhere

Nexus Mod Manager Compatible!

Version 01

===========================
By: Slayerjerman
===========================

===========================
MOD DESCRIPTION
===========================

Allows many more arrows (and ice shards) to stick in actors (enemies and player alike) as well as increases how long arrows stay visible on actors.
Several options to choose from: amounts and durations for your shooting pleasure.

RECOMMENDED MOD TO USE ALSO:

Clean Player - No arrow by Sagittarius22
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10088

===========================
Values
===========================

ArrowInTheEverywhere_Low.esp
	Max Arrow Count: 10
	Arrow removal timer: 10 seconds

ArrowInTheEverywhere_Low_Longer.esp
	Max Arrow Count: 10
	Arrow removal timer: 30 seconds

ArrowInTheEverywhere_Med.esp
	Max Arrow Count: 25
	Arrow removal timer: 30 seconds

ArrowInTheEverywhere_Med_Longer.esp
	Max Arrow Count: 25
	Arrow removal timer: 60 seconds


ArrowInTheEverywhere_High.esp
	Max Arrow Count: 50
	Arrow removal timer: 60 seconds

ArrowInTheEverywhere_High_Longer.esp
	Max Arrow Count: 50
	Arrow removal timer: 120 seconds

ArrowInTheEverywhere_Mega.esp
	Max Arrow Count: 100
	Arrow removal timer: 120 seconds

ArrowInTheEverywhere_Mega_Longer.esp
	Max Arrow Count: 100
	Arrow removal timer: 300 seconds


ArrowInTheEverywhere_Ultra.esp
	Max Arrow Count: 250
	Arrow removal timer: 300 seconds

ArrowInTheEverywhere_Ultra_Longer.esp
	Max Arrow Count: 250
	Arrow removal timer: 600 seconds

ArrowInTheEverywhere_Insane.esp
	Max Arrow Count: 500
	Arrow removal timer: 600 seconds
author: Slayerjerman
